wpt.name: GC26H7P
wpt.desc: The Mermaid's Creamery Home by BgBdWolf, Traditional Cache (1/1.5)

groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:name: The Mermaid's Creamery Home
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:short_description: Location is easy to get to. A good grab and go as you travel. Located along the Journey through Hallowed Ground.
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:long_description:
The cache is a small lock top plastic container. The cache was placed to give the Little Mermaid a starting point for her journey. Initial contents were the Little Mermaid Travel Bug, 4 Twist-up crayons, 2 Spiderman balls and some Avon samples.
First to Find Honors go to orangeblssm1976!!!

groundspeak:log.groundspeak:text: I think this is the first time I've ever gotten a cache while it was snowing. :)
